means: 令人沮丧的，使人泄气的
使气馁( discourage的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Today's report is rather more discouraging for the economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天的报道让人对经济更加丧失了信心。

sentence.Network_en: It's very discouraging to be sneered at all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 成天受嘲讽是很令人泄气的.

sentence.Network_en: It's discouraging that so many students have failed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那么多学生考不及格,真令人泄气.

list.abs: bing词典——英语部落格 - 人人小站 ... Present value： 现值 Discouraged workers： 丧失信心的工人 Disposable income： 可支配收 …
失去信心的工人（discouraged workers）是游荡在劳动力市场边缘的人员中的一部分，他们因就业市场不景气而暂时没有寻找工作。 …
所谓的沮丧劳工(discouraged worker)指的是原本没有工作想要找工作，但放弃找工作者因此，按照我们上面的定义~他们应该归于非 …
discovery　 探查打法discouraging card　 非鼓励牌distribution　分配（牌型）
请问气氛的“氛”是平声还是仄声？_百度知道 ... 气度[ bearing] 气短[ be discouraged] 气短[ breathe hard;short-winded].

entry.def: If someone or something discourages you, they cause you to lose your enthusiasm about your actions.

example.ex: It may be difficult to do at first. Don't let this discourage you.
example.tran: 万事开头难，别因此而灰心。

entry.def: To discourage an action or to discourage someone from doing it means to make them not want to do it.

example.ex: ...typhoons that discouraged shopping and leisure activities.
example.tran: 使购物和休闲活动化为泡影的台风

example.ex: ...a campaign to discourage children from smoking.
example.tran: 劝阻儿童远离香烟的运动

means.word_mean: 1. depriving of confidence or hope or enthusiasm and hence often deterring action;

sentences.sentence: "where never is heard a discouraging word"

auth_sentence.content: The UNHCR is not discouraging offers of money.
auth_sentence.res_content: The UNHCR is not discouraging offers of money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The UNHCR is not discouraging offers of money.

auth_sentence.content: Was the COMPLEX Mag discovery discouraging at all?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was the COMPLEX Mag discovery discouraging at all?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was the COMPLEX Mag discovery discouraging at all?

auth_sentence.content: Some Western governments are also discouraging this option.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some Western governments are also discouraging this option.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some Western governments are also discouraging this option.

Sentence.sentence: And it may be especially discouraging if you happen to be looking for a job or hoping to change careers right now.
